aboutme: B.S./M.S. Computer Engineering student at University of California, San Diego.
Interested in Software Engineering, Backend Systems, and Cloud Infrastructure.
I enjoy working out and going to the movies in my free time!
profile.languages: Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, C, x86 Assembly, SystemVerilog, SQL
profile.frameworks/libraries: React.js, Jenkins, Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, JUnit
profile.other: Git, Visual Studio Code, Salesforce, Agile, MATLAB, LTSpice, Microsoft Office

relevant courses: Computer Architecture, Parallel Programming, Recommender Systems and Web Mining, VLSI Digital System Algorithms and Architectures
Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Architecture, Web Development, Operating Systems,
Artificial Intelligence, Systems Programming, Probability/Stats, Digital Design, Circuits and Systems, Discrete Mathematics,

description: Developed and optimized an internal Java code analysis tool to search for RegEx patterns in the company's codebase to identify poor coding practices and improve software maintenance and quality.

Integrated Jenkins with the ServiceNow platform by programming multiple scripts in JavaScript to automate the execution of Jenkins pipelines and ensure accurate data insertion of analyzer results into the appropriate tables.
Reduced analyzer delivery time by >90% from ~1.5 months to <1 week by streamlining repetitive analysis requests.
Collaborated with stakeholders of $2B law firm to understand client business objectives and develop 10+ inbound and outbound third-party system integrations with the Salesforce platform.
Analyzed 100+ Java classes and queried objects using SQL to determine data quality and integration effectiveness.

Executed Salesforce security health check and code scan and compiled resulting 1000+ data points in Excel for streamlined data analysis of platform security risks, duplicate management, and outdated web components.

experience.company: Institute of Electrical And Electronics Engineers @ UCSD
description: Managed multiple organization social media accounts to market events/workshops to reach our 1500+ followers.
Organized 10+ professional development events/workshops (in-person/online) to 400+ student members yearly.
Built a personal portfolio web application using React.js.
Implemented a cache simulator in C++ to simulate various RISC microprocessors (MIPS R10000, Alpha A21264).
Simulated an Instruction cache, a Data Cache and an inclusive/non-inclusive Level 2 cache following an LRU replacement policy.
Achieved up to 5.07x speedup with a localized stride prefetcher implementation.
Built a fortune-telling tarot cards web application in HTML, CSS, and JS in a team of 9 students.
Led 2 developers within the team to implement the landing page and start menu page with functioning music volume control and dark mode capabilities using localStorage.
Exercised Agile methodologies, user-centered design, and test-driven development firmly.

Programmed a Discord bot in Python that allows users to search recipes, estimate macronutrients and ingredient substitutes of dishes, and generate other food-related info utilizing the Discord and Spoonacular API/developer portals.
Implemented the bot in 4 Discord servers of 30+ members, hosting the bot entirely on Repl.it and continuously monitoring with UptimeRobot.
